name: Potshot
desc: Free action. An uncounterable attack. Requires terrain with DEF boost.
components: game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '2' or game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '3' or game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '8' or game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '20' or game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '21' or game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '41' or game.tilemap.get_terrain(unit.position) == '42'
